title: The best food processor we've ever used is at an amazing low price today
text:
The best food processor we've ever used is at an amazing low price today

Get this coveted food processor at a super low price. (Photo: Reviewed / Jackson Ruckar)

— Our editors review and recommend products to help you buy the stuff you need. If you make a purchase by clicking one of our links, we may earn a small share of the revenue. However, our picks and opinions are independent from USA Today’s newsroom and any business incentives.

The holidays are coming soon, and before you know it you're going to be in a frenzied state trying to cook six things at once. If you want to make your dinner prep a little bit easier for the holidays, the Cuisinart Food Processor is the perfect cooking assistant, and for today only, you can get it for one of the lowest prices we've ever seen.

While it normally retails around $150, Amazon is currently selling the Cuisinart 14-Cup Food Processor in brushed stainless steel for just $100, which is a cool $50 in savings. We've only seen its price dip this low once before, when it was a Lighting Deal during Prime Day earlier this year. And while the price may drop again on Black Friday, that won't be much help since Thanksgiving lands before that, and you'll want as much assistance as possible to chop, shred, and mix ingredients on Turkey Day.

When we tested the best food processors, the Cuisinart unsurprisingly took the top spot and bested its competitors due to its ease of use, quiet operation, and impressive performance. No matter what task we threw at it—from chopping onions to slicing tomatoes to kneading pizza dough—the Cuisinart tackled each job like a champ. Plus, each of the parts is dishwasher-safe, which you'll be thankful for come clean-up time.

Included with the processor are a stainless steel slicing disc, medium shredding disc, and stainless steel chopping/mixing blade. It also features seven food prep functions, such as emulsify, knead, and puree, so the sky's essentially the limit in terms of what you can use it for.

In fact, my coworker Courtney Campbell was particularly excited to see the Cuisinart on sale because she loves hers so much. She explained, "While a food processor isn't essential, it speeds up your chopping and shredding time and allows you to create foods like cauliflower rice, hummus, and pesto in minutes. Once you figure out all the things you can do with it, it will be in your everyday cooking arsenal."

With over 2,000 reviews and a 4.2-star rating on Amazom, this machine is a beloved kitchen staple in so many households. If you want that extra help chopping carrots, mashing potatoes, or mixing cranberry sauce this Thanksgiving, act fast and snag the Cuisinart at this amazing price while you still can.
